title: DRSHANKs
author: DRSHANKs
content: Dr. Shank is offering 10 Eagles NFTs to 10 randomly-selected lucky winners in the ongoing airdrop program.Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFT give you access to the astounding virtual universe (Metashank) being created by Dr. Shank and his team as well as enables you to earn up to 3% of the total reward pool in $Eth. Here’s how you can participate in the airdrop to win NFTs for free.What is Dr. Shank’s NFT Airdrop?An airdrop is a giveaway campaign or a marketing program, where the host will offer free tokens or cryptocurrencies to participants who successfully complete the airdrop steps.Dr. Shank is organising an exclusive airdrop for those interested in owning/minting Dr. Shank’s Eagles NFTs. He will randomly select 10 winners and reward them with 1 NFT each. This is a lucky draw and all participants get an equal and fair chance of winning.Rewards:  10 Dr. Shank’s Eagle NFTs for 10 lucky winners (randomly selected via a lucky draw)Airdrop end date: 17th June 2022Winner announcement: 20th June 2022How will winners be selected?This is a lucky draw competition, and winners will be selected purely randomly by Dr. Shank after the airdrop ends on the 17th June. Out of all participants who successfully complete all the steps in the program, the team will randomly select 10 winners, who will each be rewarded with a Dr. Shank’s Eagle NFT.** Value per NFT: 0.099 $ETHHow to join Dr. Shank’s NFT AirdropFollow these steps to join the airdrop program. Make sure to complete all the steps, follow the rules and submit your details at the end.1. Open the Dr. Shank NFT Airdrop form.2. Join Dr. Shank NFT on Telegram.3. Follow @ShankNFT on Twitter.4. RT + Like + Tag 3 friends on the pinned tweet.5. Follow Dr. Shank NFT on Instagram.6. Join Dr. Shank NFT’s official Subreddit.7. Join Dr. Shank NFT’s official Discord Channel.8. Submit your Ethereum wallet address and details to the Form (step 1).Each participant can only make one entry into the program. Duplicate entries will be banned. Make sure to follow all the campaign rules, otherwise you’ll be banned. If you have questions or queries about the airdrop, feel free to send us a message on Discord or Telegram.How to increase your chances to win a free NFT?Though it is a lucky draw program, where the winners will be selected randomly, you can still increase your chances of winning by completing all the steps in the program according to the rules and before the end date.How else can you own a Dr. Shank NFT?Even if you miss the chance to win a free NFT in the airdrop, you can still own Shank NFTs by minting them in the presale.Dr. Shank is giving a #presale access to the first 999 members who send a message on our #discord channel (https://discord.st/dr-shank-nft/) telling us why they want to own a Dr. Shank NFT. They can mint your NFT on the website (once the presale is live and access is given).
